short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add products to cheaper.ly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When viewing any product simply click the cheaper.ly plugin icon and hit "Tell me when it's cheaper". 

We'll add your listing to cheaper.ly right from your browser with no need to visit the cheaper.ly website.

We're saving you time as well as money!
